Literature.Title: Structure-activity relations of parasin I, a histone H2A-derived antimicrobial peptide
Literature.Author: Koo YS, Kim JM, Park IY, Yu BJ, Jang SA, Kim KS, Park CB, Cho JH, Kim SC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus mutans ATCC 25175(MIC=2µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 62037(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 15752(MIC=1µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 27325(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas putida ATCC 17426(MIC=1µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 13076(MIC=2µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 34881(MIC=2µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae ATCC 44774(MIC=1µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=1µg/ml)
